item.title: American Lawful Immigration 2018 : New LPRs by State of Residence
item.description: Legal Permanent Residents (LPRs) are non-citizens who are lawfully authorized to live permanently within the United States. Let's explore data from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to highlight the states in which people who received a green card in 2018 settled.
item.dc:creator: Data Show

item.title: American Lawful Immigration 2018 : New LPRs by Country of Birth
item.description: Legal Permanent Residents (LPRs) are non-citizens legally permitted to live permanently in the United States. Letâ€™s explore the data from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to highlight the regions and countries of birth of those people who received a green card in 2018.
item.dc:creator: Data Show

item.title: World Press Freedom Index 2020
item.description: The Press Freedom Index, yearly produced by Reporters Without Borders is a ranking of 180 countries which attempts to represent the degree of freedom that journalists, media, and netizens have in each country. The index is calculated on a scale from 0 to 100, the higher a country's score, the more worrying the press situation is. Using RSF data, we will visually represent this index of press freedom on maps.
item.dc:creator: Data Show
